root: ^An Amazing Spin-Off of a Fan Favorite Series
^Thanks for considering my proposal. I think that this expansion of the Dune universe will be a smash-hit. People love Paul, and Paul loves the people. Excited to work with you.

^Paul Atreides is in over his head. Born to a destiny beyond his wildest dreams, the dashing young man must go on a journey to the most dangerous planet in the galaxy in order to collect the precious resources that ensure his people’s survival. The material in question? Spicy Melange. The most potent aphrodisiac known to man, Spicy near instantly causes the individual that takes it to become the most attractive, alluring person in a 47 mile radius. But to obtain it, Paul must risk it all.
